caption.center: PAKIE V. PLASTINO, Appellant, v. LARS E. TRULSON, ET AL, Respondents.

court.center: The Court of Appeals of Washington, Division One.

posture.unpublished: [EDITOR'S NOTE: This case is unpublished as indicated by the issuing court.] Appeal from a judgment of the Superior Court for King County, No. 782948, James J. Dore, J., entered August 6, 1979.
